ygData.subject: Re: Where to hunt at 20
ygData.msgSnippet: Good thing about Goons, they only leave the compound at night. Also, if you are a dark race (iksar not included), they will not bother you (ie. if you can
ygData.messageBody:
Good thing about Goons, they only leave the
compound at night. Also, if you are a "dark race" (iksar
not included), they will not bother you (ie. if you
can shop/bank at the OT outpost, you'll be ok). One
of the Goons' last name is the same as that Bard
speed song, so you KNOW he's fast. Also, they make
rounds on the road at night, leaving the outpost,
travelling on the road, and then back-- IF they are not
agrod by pulling PCs. <br><br>Someday I'll get a group
together and go kill one for revenge.
